item.title: AWS EKS Workshop
item.description: Day1 # Setup # https://www.eksworkshop.com/020_prerequisites/ec2instance https://www.eksworkshop.com/030_eksctl/launcheks https://www.eksworkshop.com/beginner/060_helm/helm_intro/install Tasks # Deploy simple application Fargate Notes # There are 2 modes in EKS: EC2 Fargate They can coexist in EKS. Also we can only fargate only.
